Meanwhile, the ornithologist Gould had discovered that the bird specimens Darwin brought from the Galapagos had been incorrectly categorized.

There was a mistake

in the bird samples you made in the Galapagos.

Surely not!

In these samples,

names were given based on the size of the beaks. However all of these birds are finches.

All of them are finches?

Yes. They are all

slightly different in appearance, but they are all varieties of finches.

136
